mapper.update: update five_ed_out_review set business_key = #{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_no = #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stage_name = #{stageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, step_id = #{stepId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, form_no = #{formNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, step_name = #{stepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_no = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_process_end = #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, review_level = #{reviewLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, review_type = #{reviewType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attend_user = #{attendUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, stage_name, step_id, form_no, step_name, contract_no, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, remark, process_instance_id, is_process_end, review_level, review_type, attend_user from five_ed_out_review where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, stage_name, step_id, form_no, step_name, contract_no, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, remark, process_instance_id, is_process_end, review_level, review_type, attend_user from five_ed_out_review
